price: 27. And have placed therein firm, and tall mountains, and have given you to drink sweet water?
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ شَٰمِخَٰتٖ وَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُم مَّآءٗ فُرَاتٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā fīhā rawāsiya shāmikhātin wa-asqaynākum māan furātan
translations: and We gave you to drink
